text: Radhadamodar Sanskrit Vidyapith is one of affiliated government Sanskrit universities of Nepal Sanskrit University at Jaitar of Sankhar village development committee in Syangja District of Nepal. This campus offers Uttarmadhyama (Intermediate) as well as Shastri (Bachelor) levels of study. ==References== ==See also== *Nepal Sanskrit University Category:Universities and colleges in Nepal
title: Radhadamodar Sanskrit Vidyapeeth
